page.title: 08PLAYGROUND GAMES 1
page.content: {Toffee Apple}- is a game for five people What you have to do is to say a rhyme and you have to say 'Toffee Apples' in it. e.g. I went to the shop to get some sweets and when I saw some lovely red apples I bought them. I took them home with some toffee and made some 'Toffee Apples'. Then you have to run away before you get touched. This can also be called 'Poison'. {45 Bonker}- is a game for any number of players. The more the better. What you do is one person is ON and the rest have to run off and hide. Then the one who is ON has to count to 45 and when they get to 45 they say 'Ready' and have to try and get them out before they get home. If you see someone you say 45 Bonker out. The first one caught is ON next.
